request.description: Get the currently active homepage. This is a public route that doesn't require authentication.
Get a list of all homepages. Requires authentication and 'read-homepages' privilege.
Get a specific homepage by ID. Requires authentication and 'read-homepages' privilege.

request.description: Create a new homepage. Requires authentication and 'create-homepages' privilege. Setting is_active to true will deactivate all other homepages.
Update a homepage (full update). Requires authentication and 'update-homepages' privilege.
Partially update a homepage. Requires authentication and 'update-homepages' privilege.
Set a homepage as active. This will automatically deactivate all other homepages. Requires authentication and 'update-homepages' privilege.
Delete a homepage. Requires authentication and 'delete-homepages' privilege.
